Deficiency Narrative: A child in care was left unattended resulting in an injury involving a horse.
The operation is a GRO and their policies do not permit routine searches. Multiple children and house parents stated the children are searched routinely after school.
Correction Narrative: Mr. Childress (Chief operations officer) sent an email follow up on 12/03/2024, with WTBR policy on conducting searches when there is a reasonable suspicion of prohibited items, items that endanger child safety, if child has made suicidal threat or threatened to harm self or others, if a child involved in theft, and after home visits.

Deficiency Narrative: The child's rights form and the intake packet for the operation did not include information regarding searches.
Correction Narrative: Mr. Childress (WTBR chief operations officer) provided the following documents via email on 12/03/2024: the operation's updated child's rights form, intake packet, placement agreement, and search policy acknowledgement form for the operation to include information regarding searches.

Deficiency Narrative: Pre-service Emergency Behavior Intervention training for staff and caregivers is a 6 hour training.
Correction Narrative: The inspector received an email from the Program Director on 11/14/23. EBI training certificates for the caregivers reviewed were sent. An EBI refresher training was provided to caregivers on 11/13/23. The plan moving forward is to provide all 8 hours of pre-service EBI training at once, then do refreshers for annual training. The certificates were added to the document library.

Deficiency Narrative: Two cottage parents are no longer employeed but still have an active background check.
Correction Narrative: The inspector received an email from the Program Director on 11/14/23 stating inactive employee BGCs have been inactivated. An online BGC check confirmed that the 2 cottage parents were inactivated.

Deficiency Narrative:
While reviewing records it was noticed that  3 caregivers did not have the trauma informed care training certificate for the last two years.

This is a supplemental form that will replace the previous form. This supplemental form is to correct pending the pending standard.
Correction Narrative: The operation sent the Trauma Informed Care completion certificates for the 3 staff that did not have the training certificate in their record file.
